messages.title: Think Different Think Plaid.
messages.content: If you've never voted Plaid before, we ask you to stop and think this time. Plaid Cymru MPs have not been dragged into the scandals surrounding Westminster. They expose abuses of privilege and power, making Parliament's kitchen flipping their home addresses, or offering their services to lobbyists for cash. Plaid MPs are in parliament to keep Welsh interests firmly on the agenda.

messages.title: Plaid Cymru. Gwahanol iawn i Gymru.
messages.content: Os nag ydych chi erioed wedi pleidleisio dros Blaid Cymru o'r blaen, gofynwn i chi bwyllio a meddwl amddan y tro yma...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plaid Cymru MPs focus on exposing abuses of privilege and power at Westminster but are not involved in the scandals themselves.

issues.governance: Plaid Cymru MPs have not been dragged into the scandals surrounding Westminster. They expose abuses of privilege and power, making Parliament's kitchen flipping their home addresses, or offering their services to lobbyists for cash.

leaflet.personalStatement: This isn't a time for politics as usual!

images.caption: Plaid Cymru - The Party of Wales

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is in both English and Welsh.
